components.name: Navbar
Section Button
components.description: A button whose color is determined by the background color of its parent component (passed in via `parentColor` prop).

components.name: Section

children.name: Header
Video Container
Frame

components.name: Contact Form

children.attributes:
{
  value: name,
  type: 'text',
  placeholder: 'Name',
	error: showErrors && getError('name'),
  onChange: (value) => setName(value)
}

{
  value: email,
  type: 'email',
  placeholder: 'Email',
	error: showErrors && getError('email'),
  onChange: (value) => setEmail(value)
}

{
  value: message,
  type: 'textarea',
  placeholder: 'Message',
	error: showErrors && getError('message'),
  onChange: (value) => setMessage(value)
}

{
	parentColor: props.parentColor,
  size: "medium",
  state: props.status && 
    props.status.type === "pending" ?
      'loading' : 'normal'
}

components.name: Contact

children.attributes:
{
  parentColor: props.parentColor,
  showNameField: props.showNameField,
  buttonText: props.buttonText,
  onSubmit: onSubmit,
  status: status
}
